metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20487 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In NotificationChannel of NotificationChannel.java, there is a possible failure to persist permissions settings due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-242703202

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
